titles.title: A bill to increase funds set aside for off-system bridges.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 9/12/2013--Introduced. Increases from 15% to 25% the amount a state is required to set-aside, from funds apportioned for the highway bridge program for FY2009, for off-system bridge replacement and rehabilitation activities for FY2013 and each subsequent fiscal year. (An "off-system bridge" is a highway bridge not located on a federal-aid highway.)
